title: Hotel Portofino: Italy in the 1920's
description:
Shukri reviews the PBS Masterpiece show: Hotel Portofino. He examines Italy in the 1920's, the rise of Fascism, and comparisons between Hotel Portofino and Downton Abbey. 

--- Send in a voice message: https://anchor.fm/classxpodcast/message
